<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// responsible for allocating the memory and setting permissions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// ReentryFnAddr should be the address of a function whose signature matches</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// void&#42; (&#42;)(void &#42;TrampolineAddr, void &#42;ReentryCtxAddr). The ReentryCtxAddr</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// argument of writeResolverCode will be passed as the second argument to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the function at ReentryFnAddr.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
